assets.name: First day
assets.headline:
After 2 hours of meeting with Jerry, Audrey, and Graham Gnall, I joined LiveIntent.
It was a day after I organized 100+ participants Hackathon. To tell you the truth, I was very tired the first day.

assets.name: Dedicated Email Doc
assets.headline:
My 1st Project was to update Dedicated Process Doc on Evernote as I learn the process.

I re-wrote these documents in Confluence 4 months later when handing over dedicated email production to AdOps team.

assets.name: Server Assisted Responsive Email
assets.headline: 1st month at LiveIntent, I leaned a lot about email, especially HTML email production. I played around a lot with HTML Tables, tbody, tr, td td td...

assets.name: Dedicated monitoring app
assets.headline: Asset for Covered California dedicated campaign was delayed for a week, so I used the freed up time for making dedicated campaign monitoring tool.

assets.name: Coded & Deployed LiveIntent Newsletter
assets.headline: Graham Gnall moved to LSD project, and I took over newsletter production.

assets.name: Realtime dashboard
assets.headline:
Remember these that was on iMac for a while?
Hacked access to Graphite using PHP, got realtime data, and made dashboard.

Sounds super easy now, but It wasn't for the first time!

assets.name: Joined Innovations team
assets.headline:
1st Project I worked on was 'LiveLight' - a mobile app prototype for self serve advertisers.
This was the first time I really deep dive into backbone.js, node.js, and d3.js.

Leaned alot.

assets.name: HTML templates for easy Weekly Newsletter production
assets.headline:
I quickly became busy with dedicated, weekly newsletter production, and innovations project.
To balance, I created MailChimp email template and re-usable code blocks so Nick and Devan can create newsletter as well.

assets.name: Morning report re-design (email)
assets.headline: With Matt Shait, we stared re-organize/re-design of morning report. Showed prototype at senior staff meeting.

assets.name: Morning report dashboard
assets.headline:
We started making performance dashboard for morning report.

Also, around this time, Jake and I became dinner friends. (Jake was busy working on Reporting API)

assets.name: Made REST API for the first time !
assets.headline: After working on morning report, I realized getting data that we need for innovations project was hard as we needed to query different database and API. This I made aggregation API so we can quickly get to data.

assets.name: LiveIntent Lab
assets.headline:
LiveIntent Lab's Initial launch was first time I coded full express.js app.
Also tried to create BFF version as well.

assets.name: Screen App
assets.headline: Probably had most fun making this announcement app. Discovered node-webkit, and gave presentations about it at BrooklynJS and EmpireNode

assets.name: Tmleline App
assets.headline:
And finally, my last project was LiveIntent Timeline App.

I got much faster coding d3 chart compare to the first time I did on LiveLight.

assets.name: Thank you!
assets.headline:
I had so much fun for 14 months I was at LiveIntent. Thank you everyone who shared fun and hard work.
Now on to the next adventure !

Mariko
